dishes.name: poutine
dishes.description: Dish made of french fries and cheese curds topped with brown gravy.

dishes.name: kebap
dishes.description: Dish consists of cut up or ground meat, sometimes with vegetables, and various other accompaniments

dishes.name: tteokbokki
dishes.description: Tteokbokki is a spicy stir-fried dish that usually consists of cylinder-shaped rice cakes, sweet red chili sauce, and fish cakes.

dishes.name: mapo tofu
dishes.description: Dish that consists of small tofu cubes braised in a spicy chili bean paste-based sauce and minced meat. Served with rice.

dishes.name: kimchi jigae
dishes.description: Kimchi-jigae or kimchi stew is a stew-like Korean dish, made with kimchi and other ingredients, such as por, scallions, onions, and diced fish cakes.

dishes.name: takoyaki
dishes.description: Takoyaki is a ball-shaped Japanese snack made of a wheat flour-based batter and cooked in a special molded pan. It is typically filled with minced or diced octopus, tempura scraps, pickled ginger, and green onion.

dishes.name: shoyu ramen
dishes.description: Shoyu ramen is a ramen noodle dish flavored with shoyu, the Japanese word for soy sauce. The toppings include: pork, soft-boiled egg, shitake mushrooms and scallions.

dishes.name: gyoza
dishes.description: Japanese pan-fried dumpling with a pork filling.

dishes.name: baozi
dishes.description: Baozi are chinese steamed buns filled with pork and scallions.

dishes.name: banh mi
dishes.description: Banh mi is a short baguette split lenghtwise and filled with beef, cilantro, carrots, chilli and tomatoes.

dishes.name: pho
dishes.description: Pho is a Vietnamese soup dish consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat.

dishes.name: pad thai
dishes.description: Pad thai is a stir-fried rice noodle dish. It is typically made with rice noodles, shrimp, a scrambled egg, and vegetables.

dishes.name: pierogi
dishes.description: Half-circular dumplings, usually made from flour, bolied in salted wated. Filled with potatoes and white cheese.

dishes.name: nasi goreng
dishes.description: Nasi goreng is a fried rice dish, usually cooked with pieces of meat and vegetables.

dishes.name: chilli crab
dishes.description: Crab stir-fried in a semi-thick sweet and savory tomato and chilli sauce.

dishes.name: currywurst
dishes.description: Currywurst is a dish of German origin consisting of steamed, and fried pork sausage, seasoned with curry ketchup and served with fries.

dishes.name: tacos
dishes.description: A taco is a traditional Mexican dish consisting of a small hand-sized corn tortilla topped with a filling.

dishes.name: chilli con carne
dishes.description: Chili con carne is a spicy stew containing chili peppers, meat, tomatoes and kidney beans.
